lines.text: If Slick was trapped in the fire by <c=#0000FF>Mass Arrest Momentum,</c> then that's why! They did it on purpose, to kill him!
I don't think that really checks out, kid.
If they had Slick frozen in place, they coulda done anything to kill him. Whack him over the head with a heavy book, or somethin'.
Why fire, specifically? Seems like kind of a messy murder weapon.
Maybe... they trapped Slick with <c=#0000FF>Mass Arrest Momentum,</c> and then started a fire to burn him?
...Huh. Well, that might answer my <c=#FF00FF>other question,</c> but...
If they wanted to do it that way, why not just set 'im on fire directly? Why burn down half their apartment?
There's gotta be some reason they started such a big fire. Figure it out!
